department.ch: 永續綠能科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master Programs, Sustainability in Green Energy

goal.ch: 本課程目標是培訓學生了解物聯網核心技術中的底層感測及區域網路技術；物聯網中層核心網路技術；上層服務平台技術及相關國際標準，並且搭配實驗實習課程培養學生在物聯網實務上的開發能力。課程進程將是透過一系列實作技術課程，讓學生熟悉操作物聯網開發裝置、進而將理論應用在實際場域內，且導入Problem-Based Learning (PBL) 教學方式訓練學生自主學習。本課程後段，將導入PBL問題導向的教學方式，透過生活中實際問題及情境，引導學生聚焦於特定且真實的問題、思索和採取合宜的解決方法。學生藉由小組討論，於期末專題競賽時，展現團隊合作的成果。透過此教學方式來增強學生的創造力與實踐力。修習完本課程的學生將具備物聯網架構及相關技術之知識、在物聯網裝置上開發物聯網應用之能力及PBL教學方式所帶給學生之自主學習力。
goal.en: The objective of course is to teach students to learn the technology of basic sensor and personal area networks, core network, upper layer service platform and related international standard with lab courses of implementation. The students will get the knowledge of Internet of Things (IoT) technology and application implementation in the IoT devices. The goal of this course is to train students to understand the underlying sensing and local network technology in the core technologies of the Internet of Things; the middle-level core network technology of the Internet of Things; the upper-level service platform technology and related international standards, and to train students in the practice of the Internet of Things application development abilities. The course process will be through a series of practical technical courses to familiarize students with operating IoT devices, and then apply the theory to the actual field. In the latter part of this course, the students will be introduced by the Problem-Based Learning (PBL) process to train themselves to learn independently. PBL methods will be introduced to guide students to focus on specific and real problems, think and adopt appropriate solutions through actual problems and situations in life. Students in groups will do teamwork for the final project. Through this PBL method, students‘ creativity and practical ability are enhanced. Students who have completed this course will have knowledge of the Internet of Things architecture and related technologies, the ability to develop Internet of Things applications, and the self-learning ability that the PBL methods bring to students.
